DOC.brief_title: Epidural Analgesia Versus IV Meperidine Labor Pain Control
DOC.detailed_description: Population 60 female second stage delivery - Inclusion criterion : parturients require pain relief choose systemic epidural analgesia . - Exclusion Criteria : parturients cardiac disease , neurological disease , endocrine disease , diabetes , hypertension parturients treat medication might effect cardiovascular autonomic system . - Method : A 10 minute record 3 lead ECG perform second stage delivery ( 3-7 CM opening ) . parturient lie left side period . - 30 minute administration either epidural systemic Meperidine pain relief , second record maternal ECG take place 10 minute . - estimate duration procedure one hour per woman .
